name: Death House [DnD]
description:
Battle the undead, raptors, dragons, angels, and their elemental masters with 4 of your friends in this Mansion of Terror and search for the Heart of Darkness in the secret basement dungeon! Be wary of the elemental masters that guard the heart!

This is a first person dungeon crawl for 4 players, set in the Ravenloft's infamous Death House, built for the Core D&D competition. The house itself is based on the 5th Edition Curse of Strahd introductory adventure. The 1994 and 1995 PC games Ravenloft: Strahd's Posession and it's sequel, Stone Prophet, are what inspired this one.
